title: WearDarts
summary: Use your wearable for keeping score of your darts match!
description: You no longer have to take out your phone when you want to keep score of a darts match. With this app for your smartwatch you can keep the score of your darts match on your wrist.Set the starting score to either 301 or 501, and GO.
descriptionHTML:
You no longer have to take out your phone when you want to keep score of a darts match. With this app for your smartwatch you can keep the score of your darts match on your wrist.

Set the starting score to either 301 or 501, and GO.
comments: Very handy Great app overall, would love to see support for cricket in the future.
recentChanges: In this update the screen will remain on when you are currently tracking a match or entering a score.
Starting the app on your phone will now also trigger a notification with which the app can be more easily opened on your watch.
